title: Adaptive Card based loop components
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates a Node.js Messaging Extension for Microsoft Teams that utilizes adaptive card-based loop components, enabling link unfurling and dynamic interactions within the compose area.
longDescription: This Node.js sample showcases a Messaging Extension for Microsoft Teams that incorporates adaptive card loop components, allowing users to interact with links directly in the compose area. By copying and pasting URLs from GitHub or other sources, users can see rich previews and dynamic content, enhancing their messaging experience.
